mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(user_id, price, hotel_id, room_id, start_date, end_date, people, children, points) VALUES(#{userId}, #{price}, #{hotelId}, #{roomId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{people}, #{children}, #{points})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND ((#{startDate} BETWEEN start_date AND end_date) OR (#{endDate} BETWEEN start_date AND end_date) OR (start_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (end_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}))
SELECT SUM(price) FROM orders WHERE deleted = 0
